QuestData.Title: Ancient Suffering
QuestData.Description: You must be careful when you venture forth. Other spirits are bound to this place, malevolent and hateful ones. They've all suffered so much.$B$BNone of what they used to be remains, only suffering and a will to live. We will need that will to summon the overlord that keeps me bound here. Please, gather the essence of the spirits, and bring it back to me.
QuestData.RewardText: You can feel their anguish, can't you?$B$BMy poor friends. At least we can use you to fix things...
